mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile menu navigation by making it more intuitive and reducing the number of taps required to access key sections.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and consider lazy loading for better performance on slower connections.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions and alt text for images to boost SEO rankings.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation and increase clarity of call-to-action buttons for better user interaction.
bookingFlowTip: Ensure the booking form is mobile-friendly with larger input fields and a streamlined process.
tips: Consider adding customer reviews to enhance trust and engagement.
Improve the clarity of the pricing details during the booking process.
